roleset.name: put in, add

example.name: instill-v: unhelpful example
example.text: A small but growing number of companies are also trying to instill more fervent brand loyalty through such personalized direct - marketing ploys as catalogs , magazines and membership clubs for brand users .

propbank.arg: A small but growing number of companies
through such personalized direct - marketing ploys as catalogs , magazines and membership clubs for brand users

example.name: instill-v: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: But Wang Ta - chih credits his father for instilling in him a love of literature , and encouraging him to become proficient in traditional Chinese disciplines such as painting , chess , woodwind music and martial arts .

roleset.note: INSTILL-V NOTES: Arg numbering suggested by comparison with verbs of filling. (from instill.01-v)
